title: [有音乐]教大家能在mcbbs上看图片
txt_content:
本帖最后由 01186 于 2014-6-18 18:30 编辑 

前情提要



现在mcbbs在国外或者港台看不到图片...混乱已经解释了
国外访问附件服务器出现了异常，请等待修复








QQ截图20140215160140.png (100.52 KB, 下载次数: 8)

下载附件

2014-2-16 08:03 上传






http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=redirect&goto=findpost&ptid=235731&pid=4562078









所以看到的样子就是这样






我几天前就一直这样蛋疼的看mcbbs,直到Sonic1997告诉我改hosts可以修复~~
改hosts后就好了. .





QQ截图20140215155305.png (136.9 KB, 下载次数: 8)

下载附件

2014-2-16 08:03 上传






http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=redirect&goto=findpost&ptid=235949&pid=4618746







之后我问他可不可以发个教程他说可以(再次谢谢他啦~) @Sonic1997 




QQ截图20140215155251.png (303.01 KB, 下载次数: 8)

下载附件

2014-2-16 08:03 上传






http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=redirect&goto=findpost&ptid=235949&pid=4635014










好的开始教程了



首先是如何改hosts
注意!!需要Administrator权限(管理员)才能修改hosst文件!!

  Operating System    Version(s)    Location    Unix, Unix-like, POSIX
      /etc/hosts[2]
    Microsoft Windows
    3.1
    %WinDir%\HOSTS
    95, 98, Me
    %WinDir%\hosts[3]
    NT, 2000, XP,[4] 2003, Vista, 2008, 7, 2012 and 8
    %SystemRoot%\system32\drivers\etc\hosts [5]
    Windows Mobile, Windows Phone
      Registry key under HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Comm\Tcpip\Hosts
    Apple Macintosh
    9 and earlier
    Preferences or System folder
    Mac OS X 10.0 – 10.1.5 [6]
    (Added through NetInfo or niload)
    Mac OS X 10.2 and newer
    /etc/hosts (a symbolic link to /private/etc/hosts)[6]
    Novell NetWare
      SYS:etc\hosts
    OS/2 & eComStation
      "bootdrive":\mptn\etc\
    Symbian
    Symbian OS 6.1–9.0
    C:\system\data\hosts
    Symbian OS 9.1+
    C:\private\10000882\hosts
    MorphOS
    NetStack
    ENVARC:sys/net/hosts
    AmigaOS
    4
    DEVS:Internet/hosts
    Android
      /etc/hosts (a symbolic link to /system/etc/hosts)
    iOS
    iOS 2.0 and newer
    /etc/hosts (a symbolic link to /private/etc/hosts)
    TOPS-20
      <SYSTEM>HOSTS.TXT
    Plan 9
      /lib/ndb/hosts
    BeOS
      /boot/beos/etc/hosts[7]
    Haiku
      /boot/common/settings/network/hosts[7]
    OpenVMS
    UCX
    UCX$HOST
    TCPware
    TCPIP$HOST
    RISC OS
      !Boot.Resources.!Internet.files.Hosts
   
来自http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hosts_(file)


拿win8来当例子(我的电脑是win8的...)
win8在%SystemRoot%\system32\drivers\etc\里
首先打开一个文件夹




QQ截图20140215162548.png (45.45 KB, 下载次数: 9)

下载附件

2014-2-16 08:26 上传








输入%SystemRoot%\system32\drivers\etc\<font size="4">%SystemRoot%\system32\drivers\etc\</font>复制代码




QQ截图20140215162557.png (35.53 KB, 下载次数: 9)

下载附件

2014-2-16 08:26 上传








你就会看到他




QQ截图20140215162612.png (41.12 KB, 下载次数: 10)

下载附件

2014-2-16 08:26 上传






这个就是




QQ截图20140215162625.png (2.2 KB, 下载次数: 9)

下载附件

2014-2-16 08:26 上传








预防万一先备份




QQ截图20140215162942.png (1.94 KB, 下载次数: 8)

下载附件

2014-2-16 08:40 上传






用txt格式来打开它




QQ截图20140215163230.png (32.61 KB, 下载次数: 8)

下载附件

2014-2-16 08:40 上传






上面那个以过期,新版是183.136.233.236 attachment.mcbbs.net
183.136.233.236 attachment.mcbbs.net复制代码




QQ截图20140215163535.png (12.97 KB, 下载次数: 10)

下载附件

2014-2-16 08:40 上传







感谢719220502提醒最下面添加不输入回车则无效

保存就可以啦~~


来一个成功的图










再次谢谢Sonic1997
希望快一点修复啊






音乐

http://www.xiami.com/widget/32084749_1771759927,1770505431,1771586985,1769482129,1771166843,1770685560,1769275853,1772471250,1770705948,3619481,_235_346_FF8719_494949_1/multiPlayer.swf




花钱丶伤给我的图感觉好爽怎么破?我是不是坏掉了??

改hosts文件要管理员限权的,因为hosts文件可以强行把你链接到一个ip地址

replies.author: zhangcl
replies.txt_content:
01186 发表于 2014-2-25 07:52
改hosts文件要管理员限权的,因为hosts文件可以强行把你链接到一个ip地址
怎么弄管理员。。详细点说吧

zhangcl 发表于 2014-2-24 15:57
怎么弄管理员。。详细点说吧
自己看一下wiki啊...
打开设备管理器

Windows 95／98／Me
按“开始”中“设置”的“控制面板”
打开“系统”组件，并移至“设备管理器”标签
Windows 2000／XP
在“我的计算机”上按右键，并点击“属性”
点击“硬件”中的“设备管理器”
Windows Vista／7
在“计算机”上按右键，并点击“属性”
点击左侧的“设备管理器”

replies.author: mjmj1996
replies.txt_content:

嘛，不过你确定不以administrator权限打开host文件修改有效么。。。。

mjmj1996 发表于 2014-2-28 21:13
Great!~
嘛，不过你确定不以administrator权限打开host文件修改有效么。。。。
只有administrator(管理员)才能修改host文件,因为host文件会强行定位到某个ip

replies.author: 吾是新手渣渣
replies.txt_content:
# Copyright (c) 1993-2009 Microsoft Corp.
#
# This is a sample HOSTS file used by Microsoft TCP/IP for Windows.
#
# This file contains the mappings of IP addresses to host names. Each
# entry should be kept on an individual line. The IP address should
# be placed in the first column followed by the corresponding host name.
# The IP address and the host name should be separated by at least one
# space.
#
# Additionally, comments (such as these) may be inserted on individual
# lines or following the machine name denoted by a '#' symbol.
#
# For example:
#
#      102.54.94.97     rhino.acme.com          # source server
#       38.25.63.10     x.acme.com              # x client host

# localhost name resolution is handled within DNS itself.
#        127.0.0.1       localhost
#        ::1             localhost
#223.6.253.56 attachment.mcbbs.net

这样？

吾是新手渣渣 发表于 2014-3-25 23:46
# Copyright (c) 1993-2009 Microsoft Corp.
#
# This is a sample HOSTS file used by Microsoft TCP/IP f ...
# Copyright (c) 1993-2009 Microsoft Corp.
#
# This is a sample HOSTS file used by Microsoft TCP/IP for Windows.
#
# This file contains the mappings of IP addresses to host names. Each
# entry should be kept on an individual line. The IP address should
# be placed in the first column followed by the corresponding host name.
# The IP address and the host name should be separated by at least one
# space.
#

# lines or following the machine name denoted by a '#' symbol.
#

这样就可以了
